titleStmt.title: Remarks on the R. Mr. Goodwins Discourse of the Gospel proving that the Gospel-covenant is a law of grace, answering his objections to the contrary, and rescuing the texts of Holy Scripture, and many passages of ecclesiastical writers both ancient and modern, from the false glosses which he forces upon them / by William Lorimer ...
titleStmt.author: Lorimer, William, d. 1721.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
